description: Rear roof extension to main roofslope; roof extension to rear outrigger; installation of two rooflights to front roofslope; single storey rear infill extension; and associated internal and external alterations
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s):

001 (Location Plan); 002 (Existing Ground Floor); 003 (Existing First Floor); 004 (Existing Second Floor); 005 (Existing Roof Plan); 006 (Existing Section A); 007 (Existing Section B); 008 (Existing Section C); 009 (Existing Section D); 010 (Existing Rear Elevation); 011 (Existing Front Elevation); 201 (Proposed Ground Floor); 202 (Proposed First Floor); 203 (Proposed Second Floor); 204 (Proposed Roof Plan); 301 Revision A (Proposed Section A); 302 (Proposed Section B); 303 (Proposed Section C); 304 Revision A (Proposed Section D); 401 Revision A (Proposed Rear Elevation); 402 (Proposed Front Elevation); Design and Access Statement
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development hereby approved shall be as per those described in the submitted application form and plans listed in Condition 2.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
| No part of the flat roofs of the proposed dwellinghouse shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof terrace/garden or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties and future occupiers of the development, in accordance with policies 7A ,7B and 7D of the Ealing Development Management Plan (2013) and policies D4 and D6 of the London Plan (2021).

| The proposed first floor and rear outrigger windows on the side elevation which faces 14 Second Avenue shall contain only obscure glass and if they have top openings, to be at a minimum of 1.7m from floor level.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of neighbouring properties in accordance with policies D3 and D6 of the London Plan (2021), policies policy 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012).
